title: Review of FAA’s Deployment of Controller Automation Tools
text: Review of FAA’s Deployment of Controller Automation Tools Text Size: Review of FAA’s Deployment of Controller Automation Tools https://www.oig.dot.gov/sites/default/files/FAA%20Deployment%20of%20Controller%20Tools%20for%20PBN%20Final%20Report%5E8-20-15.pdf 173117 Review of FAA’s Deployment of Controller Automation Tools The U.S. Department of Transportation’s Office of Inspector General   assesses the U.S. Federal Aviation Administration’s (FAA’s) progress in developing new air traffic controller automation tools for managing performance-based navigation operations and the degree to which these tools meet air traffic controllers’ needs.   9/1/2015
